title: Entrepreneur's Business Simulator
description: Entrepreneurâ€™s Business Simulator is a software designed to train young entrepreneurs within all aspects of business and financial management.

title: PractiCal Food Ordering System
description: It is a food ordering system which is lead by a nutritionist. It helps deliver you your desired meal plan based on your dietary needs and more.

title: NFT Showroom
description: It is a platform which showcases digital assets while providing a user friendly and a safe way for everyone to engage with the world of NFTs.

title: LawnPro Software
description: This is a Lawn Business Software which comes prepacked with a bunch of features to manage employees, payments, customers and more.

title: Cloud Munshi
description: It is a Point-of-Sales (POS) software for those who wan to keep track of their inventory and manage businesses.

title: Ticket Booking System Decentralized App
description: This is a decentralized app for hosting events and selling their respective tickets. Anyone with a web3 wallet can use it.

title: Crowdfunding Decentralized App
description: It is a crowdfunding solution but built entirely on web3.0. Host your projects here for funding via crypto and withdraw funds whenever.

title: ExpenTable
description: An Expendible Timtable suitable for quick weekly planning. Simple yet loaded with features you will love.

title: Crypto Price Tracker
description: ETL pipeline with DLQ support for extracting and aggregating Crypto timeseries data.

title: YC Directory
description: A startup directory where you can showcase your startup and engage with people.

title: The Save Stash
description: This is where I keep all my games' save files as trophies

title: Tkinter Mod Manager
description: This is a simple mod manager built on Tkinter. This applet is named mod manager because there are certain games which have an option to add or remove mods by copying/pasting/deleting files from one directory to another. The mod files in questions are named in a non-human-friendly way (e.g. 1234567.mod), now copying and pasting those files from directory to another will of course work but not when you want to keep track of which files belong to which mod. This applet makes that task easy.

title: Shortcut Keeper
description: An icon grouper applet for windows, inspired by icon grouping feature in GNOME and android desktops. This is just like the icon grouping found in android and GNOME desktops.

title: Jevil's Dilemma
description: This is a Web-based version of the tabletop party game called Dilemma. In the traditional version of this game you have a pack of flash cards, all of which contain a question. This question describes a scenario which forces you to choose an 'action'. There are no scores, no correct answers, no winners ... just pure brimming creativity.

title: Color To GrayScale Converter
description: I made this to assist me in picking out the grayscale version of colors during my pixel art practice. Nothing too fancy about it.

title: Triple Triad Card Maker
description: This is a game card generator which takes in .png assets and compiles them into a game card which can then be printed.

title: Docker Practice/Tutorial Repo
description: This is a repo which contains docker related shenanigans. These are the things I have tried with docker and wrote a tutorial about it.

title: Invoice Generator
description: This is an invoice generator built with Jinja2 and WeasyPrint. You can use this to make a pdf and an html invoice. Before you can use this script, you will need to customize some settings beforehand.

title: Screen Magnifier
description: An app for magnifying a portion of the screen. Useful for when you want to enlarge a portion of the screen while presentating a lot code and text.

title: Image Classifier App
description: This is a simple image classification app made with using MobileNetV2 model and Tensorflow.

title: Python Dependency Report Generator
description: It produces a docx format document which lists out all the dependencies that a certain python environments uses.

title: Usagi Chan's Number Guessing Game
description: This is a number guessing game where the player will be given a number and they will have to guess if the next number will be larger or smaller. Based on their answer they will either get a point or loose a life.

title: WebGL Fluid Simulation
description: This is a small side project to simulate fluid effects on an html document using vanilla JS, HTML and CSS.

title: Marketing Campaign EDA On Supermarket Dataset
description: This is an attempt to analyze and find trends in the marketing campaign of a supermarket.

title: Exploratory Data Analysis Of Pokemon Data - 2022 Submission for DataDNA Challenge
description: This is a submission for 2022 DataDNA competition hosted by OnyxData.

title: Exploratory Data Analysis Of Hate Crimes In USA (1991-2020)
description: This is an exploratory data analysis exercise which targets hatecrime records in different parts of USA (1991-2020) & extracts valuable insights from it.
